thread.title: Manchester United complete midfielder deal: Four-year contract agreed
thread.title_full: Manchester United complete midfielder deal: Four-year contract agreed

title: Manchester United complete midfielder deal: Four-year contract agreed
text:
1 of 12 Click through the gallery to reveal our best Man Utd v Liverpool combined XI 
Lingard has been in and out of Mourinho’s starting XI this season with competition in midfield rife, but the Portuguese boss has made it clear the 24-year-old remains part of his plans going forward. 
The winger made his breakthrough under Louis van Gaal, having previously been on loan at Leicester, Birmingham, Brighton and Derby. 
But Mourinho sees plenty of potential in Lingard and he hopes to nurture his talent in the coming years. GETTY Jesse Lingard wil learn £90,000 a week on his new deal GETTY Jose Mourinho is keen to use Jesse Lingard as part of his future plans 
Mourinho has been quick to secure the futures of his players this month with Marouane Fellaini only signing a new contract today. 
The Belgian also signed a four-year deal with the option for an extra year. Related articles
